name: Asma El Hamzaoui
description:
'''Asma El Hamzaoui''' (in [[Arabic]]: أسماء الحمزاوي, [[Casablanca]], 1998){{Citation needed|date=June 2020}} is a Moroccan [[Gnawa music|gnawa]] singer and musician. She is known to be Morocco's first female gnawa musician, a genre that is traditionally reserved for male artists.

In 2012, she launched her career by founding her musical group Bnat Timbouktou, where she plays [[sintir]] as well as sings. Since then, she has participated in many international events across the world, and collaborated with other artists, including [[Fatoumata Diawara]].
